name: ELI for Digital Magazines
author: Michael Herchenroder

sections.description: ELI For Digital Magazines allows an embedded ELI code in a digital PDF to be opened in a lightbox, preserving the user experience on your website instead of moving them into a new tab.
sections.changelog:
3.0 Replaced timer based link annotation updates with single instance clicks.

2.3 Updated lightbox style to fix sizing issue. Reduced Link Annotation time for faster lightbox rendering

2.2 Updated link clicks to undo full screen if browser is in full screen mode. Tested latest WP version

1.3 Tested latest WP version

1.2 Moved wp_enqueue_script into admin_enqueue_scripts, tested latest WP version

1.1 Fixes for Safari

1.0 Initial plugin

short_description: Enables ELI embedded codes in PDF digital content to open in a Lightbox.
description: ELI For Digital Magazines allows an embedded ELI code in a digital PDF to be opened in a lightbox, preserving the user experience on your website instead of moving them into a new tab.
